scripts.install-all: npm install && cd client && npm install && cd ../server && npm install
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd server && npm run dev" "cd client && npm run dev"
scripts.build: cd client && npm install && npm run build && cd ../server && npm install
scripts.vercel-build: cd client && npm install && npm run build
scripts.prisma:migrate: cd server && npx prisma migrate deploy
scripts.test: echo 'Running tests...' && cd server && npm test && cd ../client && npm test
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules client/node_modules server/node_modules client/dist server/dist
